Model

Class GameDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Model.GameDriver

  • public class GameDriver
extends java.util.Observable
    This class controls the turns - Startup phase, Fortification, reinforcement and attack phase.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    samansoltani, raghavsharda

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameDriver

        public GameDriver(java.lang.String newMap,
                  int newMoveLimit)
        Constructor initialize the GUI and map class object. Constructor is private so objects can not be created directly for this class.
        Parameters:
        newMoveLimit - Number of moves limited to game
        newMap - url of map game to be played on

      • GameDriver

        public GameDriver()
        Constructor initialize the GUI and map class object. Constructor is private so objects can not be created directly for this class.

      • startUpPhase

        public void startUpPhase()
        This method starts the startup phase of game. It assigns countries to players.
        See Also:
        updateMap()

      • allocatingCountries

        public void allocatingCountries(java.util.ArrayList<NodeOfMap> mapData)
        This method create player objects and divide countries among them.
        Parameters:
        mapData - arraylist containing NodeOfMap Objects representing continents
        See Also:
        notifyObservers

      • shiftArmiesOnReinforcement

        public void shiftArmiesOnReinforcement(java.lang.String countrySelected,
                                       int armies)
        This method call the shiftArmiesOnReinforcement method from player class, depending on the result returned by method either changes the Phase or continue with the current phase.
        Parameters:
        countrySelected - Country where armies should be placed
        armies - number of armies to be placed

      • fortificationNeighbourListUpdate

        public void fortificationNeighbourListUpdate(java.lang.String countrySelected)
        This method get list of neighbor countries of the specified country owned by same player from map class and update the controls view through controller.
        Parameters:
        countrySelected - the country whose neighbors are to be listed

      • getArmiesShiftedAfterFortification

        public void getArmiesShiftedAfterFortification(java.lang.String newCountry,
                                               java.lang.String newNeighbour,
                                               int newArmies)
        A delegate method to call getArmiesShiftedAfterFortification in Player class.
        Parameters:
        newCountry - country from where armies are to be moved
        newNeighbour - country where armies are to be moved
        newArmies - number of armies to be moved

      • setAttackListeners

        public void setAttackListeners()
        A delegate method to call setAttackListeners in Controller class

      • attackNeighbourListUpdate

        public void attackNeighbourListUpdate(java.lang.String countrySelected)
        This method create a list of neighbour countries for a selected country whith different owners than the current player. Then update list on the controls view through controller.
        Parameters:
        countrySelected - selected country whose neighbors are required.

      • declareAttack

        public void declareAttack(java.lang.String attackerCountry,
                          java.lang.String defenderCountry)
        This method announce the attack, get number of dice from both attacker and defender. If a country loose all its armies, the other player occupy the country.
        Parameters:
        attackerCountry - country attacking
        defenderCountry - country defending against attack

      • battle

        public void battle(NodeOfCountry dCountry,
                   Player defender,
                   NodeOfCountry aCountry,
                   int aArmies,
                   int dArmies,
                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> aResults,
                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> dResults)
        This method decides the result of battle between attacking country and defending country and update the state of countries.
        Parameters:
        dCountry - country defending the attack
        defender - player defending the attack
        aCountry - attacking country
        aArmies - number of dice rolled by attacker for battle
        dArmies - number of dice rolled by defender
        aResults - results of the dice rolled by attacker
        dResults - results of dice rolled by defender

      • checkStateOfGame

        public boolean checkStateOfGame()
        This method declares the game end if all the countries are owned by one player only.
        Returns:
        true if game if over, false if there is at least two players own at least one country on map

      • setPlayerOut

        public void setPlayerOut(Player defenderPlayer)
        remove player from players list, if player has not country.
        Parameters:
        defenderPlayer - player to be removed

      • setUpBoxInput

        public int setUpBoxInput(int min,
                         int max,
                         java.lang.String message)
        delegate method to call setUpBoxInput from controller class.
        Parameters:
        min - minimum value user can select
        max - maximum value user can select
        message - message explaining the purpose of input
        Returns:
        a number selected by user

      • diceRoll

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> diceRoll(int n)
        Generate random values between 1 and 6 and add them to an arraylist.
        Parameters:
        n - number of values to be generated.
        Returns:
        integer number that represents the value on the dice.

        public int max(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> array)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • callGameOver

        public void callGameOver(java.lang.String winner)
        Call Phase View to show game over.
        Parameters:
        winner - Name of the winner or Draw if no winner.

      • cardIssued

        public void cardIssued()
        If a player wins a territory during a attack, at the end of the attack phase one card is removed from pile and given to player.

        Set current player
        Parameters:
        player1 - player to be set as current player
